name: Guryong Falls, Sogeumgang
description:
7 waterfalls First 4 are slides and jumps 5 and 6 committing - easy rappels - no fixed anchors 7 impossible to descend discreetly

The trail terminates at a viewing area for fall 6 and 7 (bottom) There is a closed off area on river right - duck under the barrier and head directly up the slope If you're caught in this area, there is a considerable fine One reason for the old trail closure may possibly be the risk of sending loose rocks from the trail onto the viewing area below

Otherwise, this is a gorgeous short canyon

Approach along the Sogeum River valley is quite long, but very easy

Approach

Descent

Exit

Red tape
